long_description: Multiple paddlers looking for a safe fit? The NRS Havoc Livery Whitewater helmet adjusts its size to fit nearly any paddler. Fit system adjusts with a knob and a ratchet to create a snug fit no matter who's paddling. Adjustable chin strap and soft foam padding in key areas increase comfort. Protect what counts with the tough, ABS shell. Closed-cell EVA foam liner further enhances impact protection. The NRS Havoc Livery whitewater helmet features 10 ventilation and drainage ports.
short_description: Multiple paddlers looking for a safe fit? The NRS Havoc Livery Whitewater helmet adjusts its size to fit nearly any paddler.
